definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: lampstand (Ecclus [[מנורה]] fire, Sir 43:4);—abs. ´[[מְנו]] 2Ki 4:10 + 9 t., [[מְנׁרָה]] Ex 25:32, Ex 25:32 + 19 t.; cstr. [[מְנוֹרַת]] Zec 4:2, 2Ch 13:11 [[מְנׁרַת]], Ex 25:31 + 2 t.; pl. [[מְנׁרוֹת]] abs. 1Ki 7:49 + 2 t.; cstr. 1Ch 28:15, 1Ch 28:15, 2Ch 4:7; —lampstand:

ten lampstands in temple, pl. 1Ki 7:49 = 2Ch 4:7, Je 52:19 (so also LXX; om. ‖ 2Ki 25:14, 2Ki 25:15, del. here Now:Arch. ii. 40 < retain Gf Gie), cf. 2Ch 4:20, also 1Ch 28:15, 1Ch 28:15, 1Ch 28:15, 1Ch 28:15, 1Ch 28:15, 1Ch 28:15, 1Ch 28:15, but 2Ch 13:11 has ´[[מ]] in sg. (as
) ; cf. sg. in Zech.'s vision Zec 4:2.

seven-branched lampstand in tabern. Ex 25:31, Ex 25:31, Ex 25:32, Ex 25:32 + 15 t. Ex, Le 24:4 (with lamps upon it,), Nu 3:31, Nu 4:9, Nu 8:2, Nu 8:3, Nu 8:4, Nu 8:4 (all P).—[[מָנוֹר]] v. II. [[ניר]].
